high_descs: Turn around and walk to the coffee table then take a step to you right and walk to the white chair and take a step to your right.
Turn on the light in the corner.
Turn around and walk along the perimeter of the room until the small table with the newspaper on it is reached in the corner.
Turn on the lamp on the table.
Pick up the newspaper from the table.
anns.task_desc: Look at a newspaper under a lit lamp.

high_descs: turn around, walk forward, turn right, take a step, turn left, walk to small table with lamp in the corner
pick up the newspaper that is on the table
anns.task_desc: turn on the lamp to pick up the newspaper
